about_the_game:
Serious Sally is the type of game that old-school fans of the FPS genre really love. It retains the feel of classic shooter gameplay while being graphically modern.

Main features of the game:

  • First-person camera
  • Classic old-school FPS gameplay in the atmosphere of ancient Egypt
  • Hordes of the undead monsters to waste them all
  • 12 different game levels
  • Interesting storyline
  • Seven types of weapons
  • Health and armor system
  • Pickups with mega boosters
  • In-game achievements



Travel through ancient Egypt and kill all kinds of dangerous monsters for fun and profit!



Are you serious enough to go on this journey?

P. S. Message for Dad:
Dad, why don't you go to Egypt anymore? We've been waiting for it for so many years... and there's not a single sign that you're going there again :( Well, if you don't want to, I've decided to go there myself.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G6950 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: Serious Sally is the daughter of a very serious man. She wants to be just like her father. Her adventure is for you to follow in this old-school first-person shooter created with respect for the good old classic games of the genre. Just pure fun and violence for those who love it.
